 I. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֱלוּל‎</span> **proper name** of 6th month, Aug.—Sept. [[Neh.6.15|Neh 6:15]] (Mishna ***id.***, Palestinian <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אלול‎</span>, [[BDB#Vog|Vog]]<sup>79</sup>, Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***Ululu***</u></abbr> [[BDB#COT|COT]] [[Neh.1.1|Neh 1:1]], Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, Aramaic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">).
